name: 黃馨瑩
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week 1: Orientation
Week 2: Listening/ Speaking Unit. 1 Education and Student Life
Week 3: Reading Unit. 1 Education and Student Life
Week 4: Reading Unit. 1 Education and Student Life
Week 5: Listening/ Speaking Unit 2 City Life
Week 6: Reading Unit. 2 City Life
Week 7: Reading Unit. 2 City Life
Week 8: Review
Week 9: Midterm exam and Proficiency Test
Week 10: Listening/ Speaking Unit 3 Business and Money
Week 11: Reading Unit. 3 Business and Money
Week 12: Listening/ Speaking Unit 4 Jobs and Professions
Week 13: Reading Unit. 4 Jobs and Professions
Week 14: Listening/ Speaking Unit 5 Lifestyles Around the World
Week 15: Reading Unit. 5 Lifestyles Around the World
Week 16: Reading Unit. 5 Lifestyles Around the World
Week 17: Review
Week 18: Final Exam and Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
1. Daily Performance: 25%
  (a) Check-in Quiz and assignments- 15%
  (b) Your attendance and participation - 10%
2. Course Project/ Review Exam: 24%
3. Campus-wide Proficiency Test: 30% (期中&期末會考各15%)
4. 輔導課程成績: 21%
materials:
Required textbook(s):
Interactions 2 Listening/ Speaking by Judith Tanka/ Lida R. Baker (McGraw Hill)
Interactions 2 Reading
by Pamela Hartmann/ Elaine Kirn (McGraw Hill)
